segments.text: I am struck by the sheer number of potential accidents brewing here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is certainly the most immediate concern for water damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then there's the precarious stool, balanced so unstably beneath the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height could really cause an injury.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the floor is becoming quite slippery with all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Anyone could easily lose their footing and take a nasty spill.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the woman finally turning around, stepping into the puddle, and falling!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Plates would shatter, and there would be even more mess to clean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a chain reaction waiting to happen, all stemming from such simple oversights.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children could be seriously hurt if that stool goes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm honestly quite surprised by the level of danger that's accumulating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is making me hold my breath.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost like a slow-motion catastrophe playing out before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR
